name: Simple Calibration
description: Basic calibration for learning and simple tasks. Supports sequential and parallel group execution.

name: 1Q Check
description: Basic 1-qubit characterization (Rabi, HPI, T1, T2, Ramsey). Supports synchronized/scheduled modes.

name: 1Q Full
description: Advanced 1-qubit calibration (DRAG, RB, IRB). Supports synchronized/scheduled modes.

name: Full Calibration
description: Complete calibration sequence: 1Q Check -> 1Q Full -> 2Q (3 separate executions).

name: Parameter Sweep
description: Execute a task repeatedly with different parameter values for exploring parameter space.

name: Parallel Retry Calibration
description: Parallel execution with @task + submit(). Demonstrates retry logic with frequency offset.

name: Two-Qubit Calibration
description: 2-qubit coupling calibration (CR, ZX90, Bell) with automatic CRScheduler for MUX conflict handling.

name: Check Skew
description: System-level skew measurement and calibration across MUX channels.

name: 1Q Calibration (v2)
description: 1-qubit calibration using step-based pipeline. Supports check-only or full calibration with fine-tune.

name: Full Calibration (v2)
description: Complete calibration using step-based pipeline: 1Q Check -> 1Q Fine-tune -> Filter -> CR Schedule -> 2Q.
